articles.description: How did Enzo Maresca's Chelsea manage to dominate Paris St-Germain so much in the Club World Cup final - and how good are the Blues?

articles.description: Increasing tension between England and India players sets up a thrilling final day of the third Test at Lord's, writes Stephan Shemilt.

articles.title: Trump, Coldplay & red carpets - was Club World Cup final more like Superbowl or soccer?
